DOC.brief_summary: Body image satisfaction self- esteem level important know among student order intervene correct time . Body dissatisfaction one factor lead negative self-perception , low mood , depression , eat disorder . This may detrimental student academic performance . However , correlation body image satisfaction towards body mass index self- esteem among university female student still unclear Malaysia . Thus , purpose study determine relationship among Chinese female student . university female participant include convenience sample method . Participants complete Ronsenberg Self- Esteem Scale 8 item version Body Shape Questionnaire . These 2 scale use measure level self- esteem body image satisfaction . Body mass index calculate self- report height weight . The data analyse use descriptive correlation method .
DOC.brief_title: Body Image Satisfaction In Relation To Body Mass Index And Self- Esteem Among Chinese Female Students
